remarks: Lemma for ~ isfin3-2 .  There are infinite decrease points. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Nov-2014.)
statement:
isf32lem.a $e |- ( ph -> F : _om --> ~P G ) $.
isf32lem.b $e |- ( ph -> A. x e. _om ( F ` suc x ) C_ ( F ` x ) ) $.
isf32lem.c $e |- ( ph -> -. |^| ran F e. ran F ) $.
isf32lem.d $e |- S = { y e. _om | ( F ` suc y ) C. ( F ` y ) } $.
isf32lem5 $p |- ( ph -> -. S e. Fin ) $.
$d F x y $.
$d S x y $.
$d ph x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
